system.descriptionText: Whilst in a Vehicle, Character with help of Comrade choose a single target vehicle as a Free Action, the driver (who can be the Character) makes +0 Operate Test, or -30 Test if Vehicle has made any Movement Action other than Tactical Manoeuvring this Round. If Test is Successful, Vehicle's Weapons gain +2 to Penetration per Degree of Success on Test when firing at chosen target, bonus persists until either vehicle moves.
